body.secure-scriptCode: var feed_url = feed.new_feed_item.feed_url; evernote.create_note_with_link.setLink_url(feed_url); evernote.create_note_with_link.setBody('New note for new feed'); evernote.create_note_with_link.setNotebook(); evernote.create_note_with_link.setTags('#newfeed');
